name: Unfamiliar Room
description:
This is a minigame based on a 3DCG animation work called Unfamiliar Ones which describes daily life by physics simulation. You can kind of touch the mechanism of that animation in this game. Here is a link to watch the animation. 

Unfamiliar Ones

|How to Play:|

・U, P, J, L keys : move hands and foots

・1, 2, 3, 4 keys : change cameras

It's available to control pushing buttons on screen by mouse cursor.

Reload to click a circle arrow.
